page.title: 03ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: Michael Warren, a professional{artist, has lived in Winthorpe since 1975.His art specialises in{birds}and he finds the village both conducive to his work and conveniently placed for access to a variety of habitats. Although training at art college,he only became fully professional in 1972 after an offer to mount a large exhibition in London. He bases his designs on first-hand observation and sketching,completing the work in his study,using fine paper and acrylic paints.His backgrounds are given as much attention as the subject in a unique,somewhat stylised form. His numerous works have included designs for the R.S.P.B.,a set of postage stamps and a{book}entitled "Shorelines",published in 1984.Special commissions have taken him to America.
